channel.title: setdnsservers on 鬼画桃符
channel.description: Recent content in setdnsservers on 鬼画桃符

item.title: 设置dns
item.description: 众所周知，修改/etc/resolv.conf配置文件可以配置Linux的dns 解析服务器。 [root@VM-8-3-centos ~]# cat /etc/resolv.conf # Generated by NetworkManager nameserver 183.60.83.19 nameserver 183.60.82.98 那么苹果系统的dns 解析
